00046     : domainPtr_(0),
00047       boundaryPtr_(0),
00048       atomStoragePtr_(0),
00049       bondStoragePtr_(0),
00050       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00051       angleStoragePtr_(0),

00054       dihedralStoragePtr_(0),
00055       #endif

00057       bondCacheCapacity_(0)
00058       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00059       , angleCacheCapacity_(0)
00060       #endif
00061       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00062       , dihedralCacheCapacity_(0)

00066    /*
00067    * Constructor.
00068    */
00069    ConfigIo::ConfigIo(Simulation& simulation)
00070     : domainPtr_(0),
00071       boundaryPtr_(0),
00072       atomStoragePtr_(0),
00073       bondStoragePtr_(0),
00074       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00075       angleStoragePtr_(0),
00076       #endif
00077       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00078       dihedralStoragePtr_(0),
00079       #endif
00080       atomCacheCapacity_(0),
00081       bondCacheCapacity_(0)
00082       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00083       , angleCacheCapacity_(0)
00084       #endif
00085       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00086       , dihedralCacheCapacity_(0)
00087       #endif
00088    {
00089       associate(simulation.domain(),
00090                 simulation.boundary(),
00091                 simulation.atomStorage(),
00092                 simulation.bondStorage(),
00093                 #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00094                 simulation.angleStorage(),
00095                 #endif
00096                 #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00097                 simulation.dihedralStorage(),
00098                 #endif
00099                 simulation.buffer()
00100                );
00101    }

00103    /*
00104    * Associate with required domain, boundary, storage, and buffer objects.
00105    */
00106    void ConfigIo::associate(Domain& domain, Boundary& boundary,
00107                             AtomStorage& atomStorage,
00108                             BondStorage& bondStorage,
00109                             #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00110                             AngleStorage& angleStorage,
00111                             #endif
00112                             #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00113                             DihedralStorage& dihedralStorage,
00114                             #endif
00115                             Buffer& buffer)
00116    {
00117       domainPtr_ = &domain;
00118       boundaryPtr_ = &boundary;
00119 
00120       atomStoragePtr_ = &atomStorage;
00121       atomDistributor_.associate(domain, boundary, atomStorage, buffer);
00122       atomCollector_.associate(domain, atomStorage, buffer);
00123 
00124       bondStoragePtr_ = &bondStorage;
00125       bondDistributor_.associate(domain, atomStorage,
00126                                  bondStorage, buffer);
00127       bondCollector_.associate(domain, bondStorage, buffer);
00128 
00129       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00130       angleStoragePtr_ = &angleStorage;
00131       angleDistributor_.associate(domain, atomStorage,
00132                                   angleStorage, buffer);
00133       angleCollector_.associate(domain, angleStorage, buffer);
00134       #endif
00135 
00136       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00137       dihedralStoragePtr_ = &dihedralStorage;
00138       dihedralDistributor_.associate(domain, atomStorage,
00139                                      dihedralStorage, buffer);
00140       dihedralCollector_.associate(domain, dihedralStorage, buffer);
00141       #endif
00142 
00143    }

00145    /*
00146    * Read cache size and allocate memory.
00147    */
00148    void ConfigIo::readParam(std::istream& in)
00149    {
00150       readBegin(in, "ConfigIo");
00151       read<int>(in, "atomCacheCapacity", atomCacheCapacity_);
00152       atomDistributor_.initialize(atomCacheCapacity_);
00153       atomCollector_.allocate(atomCacheCapacity_);
00154       read<int>(in, "bondCacheCapacity", bondCacheCapacity_);
00155       bondDistributor_.initialize(bondCacheCapacity_);
00156       bondCollector_.allocate(bondCacheCapacity_);
00157       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00158       read<int>(in, "angleCacheCapacity", angleCacheCapacity_);
00159       angleDistributor_.initialize(angleCacheCapacity_);
00160       angleCollector_.allocate(angleCacheCapacity_);
00161       #endif
00162       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00163       read<int>(in, "dihedralCacheCapacity", dihedralCacheCapacity_);
00164       dihedralDistributor_.initialize(dihedralCacheCapacity_);
00165       dihedralCollector_.allocate(dihedralCacheCapacity_);
00166       #endif
00167       readEnd(in);
00168    }
00169 
00170    /*
00171    * Set parameters and allocate memory.
00172    */
00173    void ConfigIo::initialize(int atomCacheCapacity, int bondCacheCapacity
00174                              #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00175                              , int angleCacheCapacity
00176                              #endif
00177                              #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00178                              , int dihedralCacheCapacity
00179                              #endif
00180                             )
00181    {
00182       atomCacheCapacity_ = atomCacheCapacity;
00183       bondCacheCapacity_ = bondCacheCapacity;
00184       atomDistributor_.initialize(atomCacheCapacity_);
00185       atomCollector_.allocate(atomCacheCapacity_);
00186       bondDistributor_.initialize(bondCacheCapacity_);
00187       bondCollector_.allocate(bondCacheCapacity_);
00188       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00189       angleCacheCapacity_ = angleCacheCapacity;
00190       angleDistributor_.initialize(angleCacheCapacity_);
00191       angleCollector_.allocate(angleCacheCapacity);
00192       #endif
00193       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00194       dihedralCacheCapacity_ = dihedralCacheCapacity;
00195       dihedralDistributor_.initialize(dihedralCacheCapacity_);
00196       dihedralCollector_.allocate(dihedralCacheCapacity_);
00197       #endif
00198    }

00200    /*
00201    * Private method to read Group<N> objects.
00202    */
00203    template <int N>
00204    int ConfigIo::readGroups(std::istream& file, 
00205                   const char* sectionLabel,
00206                   const char* nGroupLabel,
00207                   GroupDistributor<N>& distributor) 
00208    {
00209       int nGroup;  // Total number of groups in file
00210       if (domain().isMaster()) {  
00211          file >> Label(sectionLabel);
00212          file >> Label(nGroupLabel) >> nGroup;
00213          Group<N>* groupPtr;
00214          int i, j, k;
00215          distributor.setup();
00216          for (i = 0; i < nGroup; ++i) {
00217             groupPtr = distributor.newPtr();
00218             file >> *groupPtr;
00219             for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00220                k = groupPtr->atomId(j);
00221             }
00222             distributor.add();
00223          }
00224          // Send any groups not sent previously.
00225          distributor.send();
00226       } else { // If I am not the master processor
00227          // Receive all groups into BondStorage
00228          distributor.receive();
00229       }
00230       return nGroup;
00231    }
00232 
00233    /*
00234    * Read a configuration file.
00235    */
00236    void ConfigIo::readConfig(std::istream& file, MaskPolicy maskPolicy)
00237    {
00238 
00239       // Read and broadcast boundary
00240       if (domain().isMaster()) {  
00241          file >> Label("BOUNDARY");
00242          file >> boundary();
00243       }
00244       #if UTIL_MPI
00245       bcast(domain().communicator(), boundary(), 0);
00246       #endif
00247 
00248       // Atoms 
00249       int nAtom;  // Total number of atoms in file
00250       if (domain().isMaster()) {  
00251 
00252          // Read and distribute atoms
00253          file >> Label("ATOMS");
00254 
00255          // Read number of atoms
00256          file >> Label("nAtom") >> nAtom;
00257 
00258          int totalAtomCapacity = atomStorage().totalAtomCapacity();
00259 
00260          #if UTIL_MPI
00261          //Initialize the send buffer.
00262          atomDistributor().setup();
00263          #endif
00264 
00265          // Read atoms
00266          Atom* atomPtr;
00267          int id;
00268          int typeId;
00269          int rank;
00270          for(int i = 0; i < nAtom; ++i) {
00271 
00272             // Get pointer to new atom in distributor memory.
00273             atomPtr = atomDistributor().newAtomPtr();
00274 
00275             file >> id >> typeId;
00276             if (id < 0 || id >= totalAtomCapacity) {
00277                UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id");
00278             }
00279             atomPtr->setId(id);
00280             atomPtr->setTypeId(typeId);
00281             file >> atomPtr->position();
00282             file >> atomPtr->velocity();
00283 
00284             // Add atom to list for sending.
00285             rank = atomDistributor().addAtom();
00286 
00287          }
00288 
00289          // Send any atoms not sent previously.
00290          atomDistributor().send();
00291 
00292       } else { // If I am not the master processor
00293          atomDistributor().receive();
00294       }
00295 
00296       // Check that all atoms are accounted for after distribution.
00297       {
00298          int nAtomLocal = atomStorage().nAtom();
00299          int nAtomAll;
00300          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00301          domain().communicator().Reduce(&nAtomLocal, &nAtomAll, 1, 
00302                                         MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, 0);
00303          #else
00304          nAtomAll = nAtomLocal;
00305          #endif
00306          if (domain().isMaster()) {
00307             if (nAtomAll != nAtom) {
00308                UTIL_THROW("nAtomAll != nAtom after distribution");
00309             }
00310          }
00311       }
00312 
00313       bool hasGhosts = false;
00314 
00315       if (bondStorage().capacity()) {
00316          readGroups<2>(file, "BONDS", "nBond", bondDistributor());
00317          bondStorage().isValid(atomStorage(), domain().communicator(), hasGhosts);
00318          // Set atom "masks" to suppress pair interactions
00319          // between covalently bonded atoms.
00320          if (maskPolicy == MaskBonded) {
00321             setAtomMasks();
00322          }
00323       }
00324 
00325       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00326       if (angleStorage().capacity()) {
00327          readGroups<3>(file, "ANGLES", "nAngle", angleDistributor());
00328          angleStorage().isValid(atomStorage(), domain().communicator(), hasGhosts);
00329       }
00330       #endif
00331 
00332       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00333       if (dihedralStorage().capacity()) {
00334          readGroups<4>(file, "DIHEDRALS", "nDihedral", dihedralDistributor());
00335          dihedralStorage().isValid(atomStorage(), domain().communicator(), hasGhosts);
00336       }
00337       #endif
00338 
00339    }
00340 
00341    /*
00342    * Private method to write Group<N> objects.
00343    */
00344    template <int N>
00345    int ConfigIo::writeGroups(std::ostream& file, 
00346                   const char* sectionLabel,
00347                   const char* nGroupLabel,
00348                   GroupStorage<N>& storage,
00349                   GroupCollector<N>& collector) 
00350    {
00351       Group<N>* groupPtr;
00352       int       nGroup;
00353       storage.computeNTotal(domain().communicator());
00354       nGroup = storage.nTotal();
00355       if (domain().isMaster()) {  
00356          file << std::endl;
00357          file << sectionLabel << std::endl;
00358          file << nGroupLabel << Int(nGroup, 10) << std::endl;
00359          collector.setup();
00360          groupPtr = collector.nextPtr();
00361          while (groupPtr) {
00362             file << *groupPtr << std::endl;
00363             groupPtr = collector.nextPtr();
00364          }
00365       } else { 
00366          collector.send();
00367       }
00368       return nGroup;
00369    }
00370 
00371    /* 
00372    * Write the configuration file.
00373    */
00374    void ConfigIo::writeConfig(std::ostream& file)
00375    {
00376 
00377       // Write Boundary dimensions
00378       if (domain().isMaster()) {
00379          file << "BOUNDARY" << std::endl << std::endl;
00380          file << boundary() << std::endl;
00381          file << std::endl;
00382       }
00383 
00384       // Atoms
00385       atomStorage().computeNAtomTotal(domain().communicator());
00386       if (domain().isMaster()) {  
00387          file << "ATOMS" << std::endl;
00388          file << "nAtom" << Int(atomStorage().nAtomTotal(), 10) << std::endl;
00389          atomCollector_.setup();
00390          Atom* atomPtr = atomCollector_.nextPtr();
00391          while (atomPtr) {
00392             file << Int(atomPtr->id(), 10) << Int(atomPtr->typeId(), 6)
00393                  << atomPtr->position() << std::endl
00394                  << "                " << atomPtr->velocity();
00395             #if 0
00396             for (int j=0; j < atomPtr->mask().size(); ++j) {
00397                file << Int(atomPtr->mask()[j], 8);
00398             }
00399             #endif
00400             file << std::endl;
00401             atomPtr = atomCollector_.nextPtr();
00402          }
00403       } else { 
00404          atomCollector_.send();
00405       }
00406 
00407       // Write the groups
00408       if (bondStorage().capacity()) {
00409          writeGroups<2>(file, "BONDS", "nBond", bondStorage(), bondCollector_);
00410       }
00411       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00412       if (angleStorage().capacity()) {
00413          writeGroups<3>(file, "ANGLES", "nAngle", angleStorage(), angleCollector_);
00414       }
00415       #endif
00416       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00417       if (dihedralStorage().capacity()) {
00418          writeGroups<4>(file, "DIHEDRALS", "nDihedral", dihedralStorage(), dihedralCollector_);
00419       }
00420       #endif
00421 
00422    }
00423  
00424    void ConfigIo::setAtomMasks() 
00425    {
00426 
00427       AtomIterator     atomIter;
00428       atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00429       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00430          atomIter->mask().clear();
00431       }
00432   
00433       int   atomId0, atomId1; 
00434       Atom* atomPtr0;
00435       Atom* atomPtr1;
00436       GroupIterator<2> bondIter;
00437       bondStorage().begin(bondIter);
00438       for ( ; bondIter.notEnd(); ++bondIter) {
00439          atomId0  = bondIter->atomId(0);
00440          atomId1  = bondIter->atomId(1);
00441          atomPtr0 = atomStorage().find(atomId0);
00442          atomPtr1 = atomStorage().find(atomId1);
00443          if (atomPtr0) {
00444             atomPtr0->mask().append(atomId1);
00445          }
00446          if (atomPtr1) {
00447             atomPtr1->mask().append(atomId0);
00448          }
00449       }
00450    }
